org.bytedeco.depthai

Class XLinkConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.bytedeco.depthai.XLinkConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    @Namespace(value="dai")
 @NoOffset
 @Properties(inherit=depthai.class)
public class XLinkConnection
extends Pointer
    Represents connection between host and device over XLink protocol

    • Method Detail

      • getAllConnectedDevices

        @StdVector
public static DeviceInfo getAllConnectedDevices(@Cast(value="XLinkDeviceState_t")
                                                           int state,
                                                           @Cast(value="bool")
                                                           boolean skipInvalidDevices)
        Returns information of all connected devices with given state
        Parameters:
        state - State which the devices should be in
        skipInvalidDevices - whether or not to skip over devices that cannot be successfully communicated with
        Returns:
        Vector of connected device information

      • getAllConnectedDevices

public static DeviceInfo getAllConnectedDevices()

                                                                                              boolean skipInvalidDevices)

      • getDeviceByMxId

        @ByVal
 @Cast(value="std::tuple<bool,dai::DeviceInfo>*")
public static Pointer getDeviceByMxId(@StdString
                                                                                               BytePointer mxId,
                                                                                               @Cast(value="XLinkDeviceState_t")
                                                                                               int state,
                                                                                               @Cast(value="bool")
                                                                                               boolean skipInvalidDevice)
        Finds a device by MX ID. Example: 14442C10D13EABCE00
        Parameters:
        mxId - MyraidX ID which uniquely specifies a device
        state - Which state should the device be in
        skipInvalidDevices - Whether or not to skip devices that cannot be fully detected
        Returns:
        Tuple of bool and DeviceInfo. Bool specifies if device was found. DeviceInfo specifies the found device

        @ByVal
public static DeviceInfo bootBootloader(@Const @ByRef
                                               DeviceInfo devInfo)
        Tries booting the given device into bootloader state
        Parameters:
        devInfo - Information of device which it should boot into bootloader state
        Returns:
        New device information if successful

        public int getLinkId()

      • _close

        @Name(value="close")
public void _close()
        Explicitly closes xlink connection. \note This function does not need to be explicitly called as destructor closes the connection automatically

      • isClosed

        @Cast(value="bool")
public boolean isClosed()
        Is the connection already closed (or disconnected) \warning This function is thread-unsafe and may return outdated incorrect values. It is only meant for use in simple single-threaded code. Well written code should handle exceptions when calling any DepthAI apis to handle hardware events and multithreaded use.
